pages.text: Client sided ONLY ($(#e2a3ff)$(l:https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/sodium-reforged)Download$())$(br2)$(#e2a3ff)My recommonded usage:$()$(br)Download $(bold)the most recent version for 1.16.5$() from CurseForge. This is an alternative to OptiFine, and even offers better FPS. I would also download $(#e2a3ff)$(l:https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/magnesium-extras)Magnesium Extras.$() $(br2)$(#ff0000)WARNINGS:$()$(br)Magnesium is NOT compatible with OptiFine. The only
downside is that shaders are currently not supported.
